2020880.name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic - Wacky West
2020880.description:
3 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics!

Wild Western themed tables with a 50's and 60's style pinball inspiration.

Cowboy County

  • Standard sized table.
  • 4 Flippers, 2 Slingshots, 12 Bumpers, 8 Rollovers.
  • Score Multiplier.

Radical Railway

  • Standard sized table.
  • 2 Plungers meaning 2 Balls!
  • 2 Flippers, 4 Slingshots, 10 Bumpers, 2 Rollovers.

Wacky West

  • Standard sized table.
  • 4 Flippers, 6 Slingshots, 8 Bumpers, 4 Rollovers, 2 Holes.

Cosmetics

  • Tumbleweed: 1 new playable character (the ball handles the same, differences are visual only).
  • 9 Western themed accessories; cowboy hats, native headdresses and more.
  • 9 Furs, suited to the environment.
2020880.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 土耳其语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
